attributes.action: Introduce laws that would stop call centres being the only point of contact when there position is a go between for a third party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce laws that would stop call centres being the only point of contact when there position is a go between for a third party. Call centres are setup mainly because the company they support does not have facilitys to provide that support themselves. This can lead to the person contacting the call centre not recieving the correct or recieving insufficent information and being left with no other option but to put up with it as there is no other point of contact apart from the middleman.
